title: #461 The Denver Chronicles with Ryan O'Neill and Brandt Tobler
itunes:title: The Denver Chronicles with Ryan O'Neill and Brandt Tobler
description:
Standup comedian Brandt Tobler who once tried to kill his dad, and son of a falconer and comic Ryan O’Neill met me for a throwback podcast in the tradition of the old Ice House Chronicles on the Death Squad network. They talked about hookers in between doing comedy sets at the amazing Comedy Works in downtown Denver, Colorado. 

Listen to the intro for a detailed breakdown of the entire Ukraine situation as meticulously researched and analyzed by former CIA operative turned standup comedian Ari “Kissinger of Death” Shaffir. And stay tuned for the outro to hear a cancelled comic totally backtrack on his stance after finding out new information. 

For more Ari: 

Subscribe on YouTube 

Join Ari's Patreon

Follow Ari on Instagram - @arishaffir

Shop Merch 

Ari Shaffir | Linktree

 

2022 Tour Dates & Tickets 

 

3/05 | West Jordan, UT 

3/24 | Ft. Wayne

3/25 | Grand Rapids

3/26 | Detroit

3/31 | Appleton, WI

4/21 | St. Louis

4/28 | Buffalo

5/05 | Louisville

6/17 | Minneapolis

6/18 | Chicago 

Chicago and Minneapolis presale at 10 AM March 7th, use code "JEW" for tickets!

For more Brandt: 

Instagram - @brandttobler 

Twitter - @brandttobler 

 

Check out The 31 Podcast with Brandt Tobler

Brandt’s book is available on Amazon: Free Roll 

 

For more Ryan: 

Instagram - @ryanoneillcomedy 

Listen to Danish and O'Neill on Apple Podcasts 

Check out Beach Cops on Patreon!

 

The Music:

Hank Williams - OD’d In Denver

John Denver - Guess He’d Rather Be in Colorado

Bob Seger - Get Out of Denver

English version by Comrade Dylan

 

Thank you to our sponsors! Go to 3Chi.com and use code "Ari" for 5% off Delta 8 products and head over to YoKratom.com home of the $60 kilo!
